DOC.detailed_description: This trial divide four distinct period : 1 . Baseline Period patient take pancreatic enzyme medication . 2 . An Open-Label Treatment Period patient receive ALTU-135 ( liprotamase ) . 3 . Inpatient , Double Blind Treatment Period half patient withdraw treatment receive Placebo . 4 . Second Open-Label Treatment Period patient resume treatment ALTU-135 ( liprotamase ) .
